link.title: Link Freebox router
link.description:
Click "Submit", then touch the right arrow on the router to register Freebox with Home Assistant.

![Location of button on the router](/static/images/config_freebox.png)

error.home_permission: Allow permission for Home and Alarm
error.register_failed: Failed to register, please try again on the router
error.invalid_token: You deleted the Home Assistant token, please clear your configuration in your config/.storage/freebox_home directory
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Freebox. Verify host/port and router is accessible
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Check logs for details

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the Freebox for updates (10-300 seconds)
data_description.reboot_interval_days: How many days between reboots (0-30, 0 disables)
data_description.reboot_time: Local time to perform the reboot (24h HH:MM)
data_description.temp_refresh_interval: Polling frequency after commands like cover position changes (1-5 seconds, default 2)
data_description.temp_refresh_duration: How long to maintain fast polling after a command (30-120 seconds, default 120)
